statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_id, engagement_score FROM social_media_engagement WHERE fashion_show_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement WHERE collaboration_type = 'paid' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT MAX(engagement_score) AS max_score FROM social_media_engagement;
SELECT DISTINCT fashion_show_id FROM social_media_engagement WHERE audience_comments IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT influencer_id, fashion_show_id, engagement_score FROM social_media_engagement WHERE collaboration_type = 'Sponsored' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS average_engagement FROM social_media_engagement GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING average_engagement > 50
SELECT DISTINCT collaboration_type FROM social_media_engagement ORDER BY collaboration_type
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM social_media_engagement GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_engagements > 3
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE engagement_count > 100;
SELECT social_media_id, engagement_count FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE influencer_id = 5;
SELECT social_media_id, event_date FROM SocialMediaEngagement ORDER BY engagement_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM FashionShowImpact WHERE audience_reach < 5000;
SELECT fashion_show_id, collaboration_id FROM FashionShowImpact WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT social_media_id, engagement_count FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM FashionShowImpact WHERE audience_reach > 1000 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT social_media_id, engagement_count FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE engagement_count > 500 ORDER BY social_media_id ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, event_date FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE engagement_count BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT f.fashion_show_id, f.audience_reach, c.collaboration_id FROM FashionShowImpact f JOIN SocialMediaEngagement s ON f.event_date = s.event_date WHERE s.influencer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagement ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT post_content, likes, comments FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE likes > 100
SELECT post_id, shares FROM SocialMediaEngagement ORDER BY shares DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE influencer_id = 'abc123'
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM SocialMediaEngagement GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_posts > 5
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_content, likes, comments FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE influencer_id = '7c6e0b64-4e3e-43b4-859c-83ec9972c892' ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND shares >= 50 ORDER BY shares ASC, likes DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM SocialMediaEngagement GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_likes > 500 ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count, AVG(likes) AS avg_likes FROM SocialMediaEngagement GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING post_count > 5 ORDER BY avg_likes DESC, post_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM FashionShows;
SELECT show_name, location FROM FashionShows WHERE show_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT platform FROM Influencers;
SELECT metrics_id, unique_views_count, click_through_rate FROM AudienceMetrics WHERE total_views_count > 1000 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM FashionShows LIMIT 10;
SELECT show_name, location FROM FashionShows WHERE show_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY show_date DESC;

SELECT F.show_name, I.influencer_name, S.likes_count, S.comments_count FROM FashionShows AS F JOIN SocialMediaEngagement AS S ON F.show_id = S.show_id JOIN Influencers AS I ON S.influencer_id = I.influencer_id WHERE S.engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT I.influencer_name, IM.unique_views_count, IM.click_through_rate FROM Influencers AS I JOIN SocialMediaEngagement AS S ON I.influencer_id = S.influencer_id JOIN AudienceMetrics AS IM ON S.engagement_id = IM.engagement_id WHERE IM.click_through_rate > 0.1;

SELECT F.show_name, F.show_date, I.influencer_name, S.likes_count, S.comments_count, A.engagement_rate FROM FashionShows AS F JOIN SocialMediaEngagement AS S ON F.show_id = S.show_id JOIN Influencers AS I ON S.influencer_id = I.influencer_id JOIN AudienceMetrics AS A ON S.engagement_id = A.engagement_id WHERE F.location = 'Paris' ORDER BY A.engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaUsers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT username, engagement_score FROM SocialMediaUsers WHERE followers_count > 5000;
SELECT show_name, location, start_date FROM FashionShows WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT collab_id, likes_count, comments_count, shares_count FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE likes_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaUsers ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM SocialMediaUsers WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT show_name, start_date, location FROM FashionShows WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT metrics_id, collab_id, likes_count, comments_count, shares_count FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE likes_count > 500 AND shares_count > 200 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
